# generated by cmake-generator
cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.16.3)

add_executable(guise-daemon 
  daemon.c
  main.c)


list(APPEND CMAKE_MODULE_PATH ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR})
include(Tornado)
set_tornado(guise-daemon)

target_include_directories(guise-daemon PUBLIC ../include)

target_link_libraries(guise-daemon 
  PUBLIC guise-server-lib
  PUBLIC udp-server)
